channel.title: Custom rights number
channel.description: On my server i want to add a donaters status, but i want to make it like hidden admin but i want to make it so they cant do ipban and all that because if i make them hidden they can do all the commands of playerRights = 0-4. So i was wondering if there was someway that i could add a playerRights of -1 or something like that so that i can make a portal or something like that that only donater can go into. If anyone knows how to do this or any changes of how to do this please post here, TY ;D
